msbt.message: Did you really add a new room to your place? That's awesome! You ARE gonna turn it into a gym, right? RIGHT?! 'Cause I want a membership. Here's something to cover my membership dues.
Your place got bigger? Yeah, I'm not too buff to admit I'm a little jealous. Well, here's something I no longer have room for because of my titanic arms. Maybe you can find a spot for it!
What kinda workout routine is your house doing? Are you pouring protein shakes on the siding? Because I can't believe how swole your place is getting! Here's a little house warm-up gift!

Two floors?! That's mind-blowing! You have GOT to get a hot tub and a sauna in your place. Can you think of anything better than a day at the spa after a workout? 'Cause I can't! Oh, I got you something!
